content: The story is about a secret temple located deep in the heart of a lush jungle. The temple is an ancient structure made of stone and wood, adorned with intricate carvings and statues of the Buddha. It's a peaceful sanctuary that offers a serene atmosphere and serves as a place for spiritual learning and self-discovery. The temple is led by a wise old monk who is known for his unique teaching style, incorporating stories, rhymes and jokes to make the teachings of Buddhism more accessible to his students. The temple provides a retreat for the mind, body and soul, and the place where one can learn the secrets of the universe and the path to enlightenment.
